title: Is elementary, middle school, or high school the hardest time? - Quora

response.answer_text: I vote for middle school. Children begin to change. Girls start to become young women. Boys become young men. These children are not youngsters any more in a strictly psychological sense. They begin to differentiate from their parents much to the consternation of the adults in their lives. Middle schools are frequently moody and attitudes toward school often suffers. I once suggested to a school superintendent who I worked for suggesting that middle school teachers should receive hazard pay for the work they do on a daily basis.
